column4: do people here use some cleanup program in ubuntu ? (defragment) or doesnt have to in ubuntu ??
Ubuntu does not need a defragmenter in most cases.
and like deleting unwanted files that take place in your hard drive ?
there should be an app that looks for unused packets (but not for registry, because it's not the case).
this might interest you: http://tinyurl.com/crmendp (especially the 'apt-get autoclean' part). Gd luck.
